author: wn.com
title: SABC fails to adhere to Motsoeneng suspension (DA - Democratic Alliance)
text: ( Source : DA - Democratic Alliance ) The DA will approach the High Court seeking an order holding the SABC in contempt of Court for failing to implement the suspension of its Chief Operating Officer ( COO ). Following last week's Supreme Court
